modName: tbbp HDT SBS (slim bombshell body) preset for CBBE bodyslide 2
summary: My own custom bodyslide presets  for Caliente's bodyslide 2 SBS (slim bombshell) featuring a smaller curvy body at all weight sizes. NEW SBS body version out now :D also SBSvH also available.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]Added [/size][size=3]New SBSvH (Hentai) Preset see images[/size]

[size=5]New [/size][size=3]Version 5 added see images.[/size]

[size=5]Well[/size][size=3] the fixed preset is here a bit sooner then I said I wanted to get it all fixed for you guys  also I will be replacing the old SBSv4 with this fixed one I believe you will find It better then the old one anyway aside from the broader shoulders for the Weight 0 Weight 100 has a slightly curvier torso.   [/size]

[size=5]Update [/size][size=3]Version 4 is here reworked to show a bigger difference between Weight 0 and 100 weight 0 is now really slim

[/size]and weight 100 is now different as well with far bigger assets then weight 0 just one thing I wanted to give weight 0 less broad shoulders but little did I 

know that I made the shoulders disproportionate to the neck I will be adding updated presets to fix this at a later date but for now you can fix this

before you apply my presets to you're game by changing the shoulders you're self on weight 0.



[size=5]NEW[/size][size=2] SBS body out now this version should be more attuned to the remodeled armor(link below) meaning you should have far less clipping issues with the new body then the old one also I have included 2 Presets one is for The nude/underwear body the other is for the armor/clothes also this new version is slimmer at 0 weight while 100 weight is voluptuous.I changed some sliders around but tried to leave the roundish booty I think I pulled though for the most part screenshots of the new SBS body added at 0 and 100 weight. [/size]


introducing  the new SBS (slim bombshell) body TBBP and HDT I used bodyslime 2 to make an original body type  it has body,hands and feet in the meshs folder under the appropriate directory as well as the preset being in its directory but be sure to have a check for Yourself just to be sure.
The body boasts Perky nipples and breast,roundish butt,less broad shoulders,wide hips,sculpted legs,slim waist,and all around curvy body but you can check the preset to see the sliders.

[size=4]Requirements

[/size]CBBE(for textures):http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/? or any texture for the CBBE body you like  

Bodyslide 2(for slider preset):http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?

xp32s newest skeleton http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?

HDT http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?

[size=4]highly Recommended[/size]

[size=2] Enhanced Character Edit:[b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/? used in some pictures also Racemenu by [/b][/size] [b]Expired[/b]  found here  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/? is a great one too[size=2][b]

[/b][/size][size=2]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and TBBP HDT:[/size][b][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/? used in some pictures also You can use the
bodyslide files to convert the armors to my preset be sure to use my Armor preset for the armor/clothing/robes.

[/size]For those using tropical skyrim I recommend desufires [/b][size=2]Tan and Shine for CBBEv3-2 [/size][b][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22576/? used in my pictures[/size]

[size=4]Big thanks to

[/size][/b][b]Leito86 and Phygits femfeet found here [/b][b][color=#7c7c7c]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37022/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D37022%26preview%3D&pUp=1

[/color]and to

[/b][b]Sunspot2 and [/b]MrTroubleMakers feminine hands found here  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49285/? also Bethesda for bringing us this wonderful game in the first place.[b]

[/b]
author: Megashawn
